EmailTemplate.name: Grad invite NorthWest 11.30am
EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
INVITATION TO YOUR GRADUATION
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations on your commitment and contribution to The Challenge this summer.
You are warmly invited to The Challenge Graduation ceremony.
We'd love to know if you are coming.
RSVP by clicking on the following link: http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=3a132cae1853d4e&q1={!Contact.Id}&q2=1
Where: DW Stadium Loire Drive Robin Park Wigan WN5 0UH
When: 25/10/2011
11:30 - 14:00
www.the-challenge.org
facebook.com/thechallengenetwork
The Challenge Network Ltd is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Registered address: 75 Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7HS
